vooga.towerdefense.model

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.model.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameMap holds all of the state corresponding to an entire game at a given moment, including all towers and units and the tiles that comprise the map itself.
    Author:
    Erick Gonzalez, Jimmy Longley

      • getTargetsWithinRadius

        public java.util.List<GameElement> getTargetsWithinRadius(util.Location source,
                                                 double radius,
                                                 int howMany)
        Gets howMany number of the closest targets within a radius of a circle centered at source.
        Parameters:
        source - the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        howMany - the number of units closest to source, within radius
        Returns:
        howMany number of elements within radius sorted by distance from source

      • getTargetsWithinRadius

        public java.util.List<GameElement> getTargetsWithinRadius(util.Location source,
                                                 double radius)
        Gets the targets within a radius of a circle centered at source.
        Parameters:
        source - the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        all elements within radius sorted by distance from source
